description: Learned from poong_[풍월량] '압도적 긍정적 평가!' 중독성 미쳤다는 우주선으로 암석 파괴하는 그 게임 [우주 암석 파괴자] (MFiL-NBcenQ). The streamer seems to be making a dramatic face and might be reacting intensely while playing Dead by Daylight, which suggests an engaging or suspenseful vibe.

prompts.llava: This is a highlight similar to: 'The streamer seems to be making a dramatic face and might be reacting intensely while playing Dead by Daylight, which suggests an engaging or suspenseful vibe.'. Is the content engaging? Answer YES or NO.
